skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: sleep relaxation
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Sleep Relaxation is the Alexa skill that offers guided sessions to help you unwind and drift peacefully into sleep. With over 10 unique sessions, each lasting 10 minutes, and a variety of soothing voices and relaxing background sounds, this skill is designed to prepare both your body and mind for deep, restorative sleep.

Unlock Pro Features to enjoy:

• Guided sessions with professional, calming voices
• A selection of background sounds ideal for deep relaxation
• Unlimited access with no restrictions
• Regularly updated relaxation programs
• Full access to all session lengths

We value your feedback to help us improve and provide the best sleep and relaxation experience.

Enjoy your journey to peaceful sleep!
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
